welcome.title: Welcome to Anemi Meets
welcome.description: Your new platform for connecting with others and sharing experiences. Let's get you started with a quick tour of what we offer.

features.title: Discover Our Features
features.description: Explore our powerful features including real-time chat, event creation, and community engagement tools. Everything you need to connect and collaborate.

getting_started.title: Ready to Begin
getting_started.description: You're all set to start your journey! Create your first event, join a community, or start chatting with other members.
